messages.content:
You could likely get a new loan of around 9 lakh rupees.
- Your CIBIL score is 700, which is acceptable. A higher score can get you better terms.
- You could comfortably manage a new monthly payment of 15,000 to 20,000 rupees.
- Try to close small outstanding loans or reduce your credit card debt this month. This can improve your chances.
- Always pay your existing loan instalments on time. This significantly strengthens your financial profile.
- Make sure your total monthly payments don't become too high, leaving room for unexpected expenses.
